entity.name: Robert Mueller
entity.description: Robert Swan Mueller III is an American attorney who served as the sixth Director of the Federal Bureau of Investigation from 2001 to 2013.

text: @laurenboebert The coronavirus must have went to Russia with Stormy D who was tracking Avinatti because he owes her money. Avinatti was released by Mueller, the savior, after North Korean’s leader (who was supposed to have bombed us) died, according to the media.
